actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The law bender makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Power of Authority or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Power of Authority
entries: The law bender targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (3d6 damage) psychic damage and have the {@condition incapacitated} condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the {@condition incapacitated} condition on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this law bender's Power of Authority for 24 hours.

headerEntries: The law bender casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
